name: Crystalline Bloom
description: An ice crystal of exceeding purity that is created in the frigid blooming of aCryo Hypostasis.  These frosty crystals will continue to grow according to their own cold, rigidlaws, till one day a flower of winter shall bloom and freeze everything.Perhaps it is stagnant time, that never-thawing bosom, that is the essence ofthis undying flower.
